channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report E-2024090538
item.description:
Report E-2024090538

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-27T09:15:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-06
  • City: BELLE
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XCA experienced a UN1791 Sodium Hypochlorite 12.5% release from (5) 5-gallon poly jerrycans. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-gallon of product released to a 3’ x 3’ area of the trailer floor. The jugs were punctured as a result of the pallet collapsing. Degreaser and absorbents were utilized to clean the impacted area. The damaged jugs and released material were collected and containerized into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
